snippet: The hedge fund industry’s many larger-than-life billionaires have made names for themselves by making bold bets, but they do not seem to be playing the angles in the political impasse over the federal debt ceiling.
abstract: The hedge fund industry’s many larger-than-life billionaires have made names for themselves by making bold bets, but they do not seem to be playing the angles in the political impasse over the federal debt ceiling.

headline.main: A Default Play Appears Too Risky for Hedge Funds
